titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for treatment of severe spinal cord injury equivalent to the treatment of blindness in determining whether earnings derived from services demonstrate an ability to engage in substantial gainful activity.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 1/19/1999--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide for treatment of severe spinal cord injury equivalent to the treatment of blindness in determining whether earnings derived from services demonstrate an ability to engage in substantial gainful activity.
